eksath jathika pakshaye kurunagala disa manthri dayasiri jayasekara mahatha swarnawahini wiwadaya mangaharayama pilibandawa ema pakshaye sesu manthriwarunge aprasadaya palawi thibe.wishramika janaralwarayage aayudha jawaram pilibandawa wiwadayakata paminennayi aandu pakshaya kala abhiyogaya bhara gena sahabhagi wuwa nam wiwadaya nokara mangahara yama eksath jathika pakshayata siduwu balawath paharak bawata ejapa nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha manthriwarayata chodana kara athi bawada aaranchimarga pawasayi.wiwadayata aandu pakshayen dedenaku sahabhagi wu bawin thani ayekuta dedeneku samanga sakachcha kala nohaki bawata dayasiri jayasekara mahatha pawasuwe aandu pakshaya idiripath karana chodana sandaha idiripath kirimata karunu nomathi bawin bawath janaralwaraya ema aayudha ganudenu sidukara athi bawa in sanatha wu bawath aaranchimarga prakasha karayi.ejapaye doshadarshanayata pathwi sitina jayasekara mahatha me dinawala durakathanaya pawa akriya kara thibena bawa ejapaye manthriwaru pawasathi.
